math_indices.method: OLS regression of daily company returns on daily benchmark returns

items.headline: CATL lithium mine license resumed; lithium supply risk addressed for battery materials
items.fact: CATL's Yichun lithium mine license resumed, supporting lithium supply; potential impact on battery materials availability for automakers including Tesla.

items.headline: CATL Hungary plant expected to start by early 2026, expanding European battery-cell supply
items.fact: CATL's European expansion anticipated to augment regional battery-cell supply, potentially affecting Tesla's European sourcing.

items.headline: SPY top holdings show Tesla as a listed component with notable weight
items.fact: Tesla Inc. weight in SPY ~1.79% as of Aug 26, 2025 (index membership).

window_summary: Tesla outperformed the benchmark in the window: TSLA +14.30% vs SPY +1.32%; beta ≈0.74, corr ≈0.07; annualized vol ≈61%; max drawdown ≈0%.
